questions.question: The cafeteria is clean and hygienic.
The variety of food offered is satisfactory.
The taste of the meals meets my expectations.
Food is served at the proper temperature.
The cafeteria staff is polite and helpful.
The price of the meals is reasonable.
Waiting time to receive food is acceptable.
The cafeteria environment is comfortable for eating.
Nutritional balance of meals is sufficient.
I am overall satisfied with the cafeteria services.
